description.p: Opens the Table Settings dialog, if available.
Opens the Export As dialog of the table, if available.
Triggers the search for the Smart Filter Bar.
Moves the focus to the next interactive element in the tab chain.
Moves the focus to the previous interactive element in the tab chain.
Moves the focus to the first interactive element outside the control in the next UI group (F6 group).
Moves the focus to the first interactive element outside the control in the previous UI group (F6 group).
Moves the focus to the next interactive element in the tab chain.
Moves the focus to the previous interactive element in the tab chain.
Moves the focus to the first interactive element of the next UI group (F6 group) in the tab chain.
Moves the focus to the first interactive element of the previous UI group (F6 group) in the tab chain.
Opens/closes the dropdown list or collapsible areas of the Value Help Dialog.
Cancels and closes the Value Help Dialog.
Moves the focus to the next interactive element in the Value Help Dialog. If the last element is focused, the focus is moved to the first interactive element inside the Value Help Dialog.
Moves the focus to the previous interactive element in the Value Help Dialog.
